description.@en: You have learned the deepest of secrets in the universe and share an unshakable bond with the gods above. As a result, you have gained (or perhaps earned) the watchful gaze of unsavory deities. Despite this, you are unable to call forth the most earth-shattering of Magicks, invocations unseen by other rank and file priests.

effect.@en: You can now attempt to learn Greater Magick from the list of Prayers your Expert Profession granted you, providing you possess at least three Skill Ranks in Incantation. In addition, you automatically learn one Greater Magick spell from this same list of Prayers.
